name: Oh!Buttons Dropped
description:
Controls

Mouse Button: Drag & Drop the button 

R: Retry

Arrow Keys/WASD: Move in B Mode

Space bar: Jump in B Mode

Description

You want to play the latest game but unfortunately the controller's buttons dropped down into the game world. 

Move these buttons to be pressed, to control the character to reach the goal and find the dropped buttons.

Sadly there is no action for the yellow button, as it ran out of time.
